ygData.subject: Re: Changing Server Thingy.
ygData.msgSnippet: I got an e-mail from GZ and one of the other admins leh, wanna see? :) The quest is just fucked up time consuming to do. All items are on spawns that spawn
ygData.messageBody:
I got an e-mail from GZ and one of the other admins leh, wanna see? :)
The quest is just fucked up time consuming to do. All items are on
spawns that spawn maybe once a year........

> oh yea, how can i forgot this one... when i got online on The

> y... but what the heck...Freedp/s: too bad Fred or Fredd wont work
